articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Global Headlines: Vax Urgency, Cemetery Controversy, and Conflict Zones
articles.description: This material provides a comprehensive overview of current world events. UNICEF calls for emergency Mpox vaccines, Kamala Harris criticizes Trump's Arlington visit, and Israeli strikes in Gaza claim lives. Other reports cover Typhoon Shanshan's impact in Japan, Zelenskiy's appeal to the US, and a tragic yacht disaster off Sicily.
articles.content:
UNICEF has issued an emergency tender for mpox vaccines in collaboration with Gavi, Africa CDC, and WHO, aiming to secure up to 12 million doses by 2025 depending on production capacity.

articles.author: The Indian Express
articles.title: Donald Trump backs Florida’s recreational marijuana amendment
articles.description: Trump supports legalising recreational cannabis in Florida through a constitutional amendment, arguing against criminalizing possession of small amounts. DeSantis opposes the measure, but Trump urges state lawmakers to regulate public use. Advocates claim Republican concerns about odour are exaggerated.
